item.title: More than 100 aid groups warn of 'mass starvation' in Gaza
item.description: A statement released by the 115 aid groups warned of "record rates of acute malnutrition" in the Gaza Strip.

item.description: At least 575 people were rescued, but three people died and two remain missing.
